p: The research question raised by the work at hand is justified by the need for additional scholarship and policy analysis explorations on this issue and the lack of content analyses in disentangling jointly SDGs related to microfinance and resilience. In order to systematise and categorise key topics within SDGs, this work made use of content analysis methods. Content analysis has, indeed, been increasingly adopted as a technique for scrutinising text connections in social sciences (Bos and Tarnai, 1999).
